page.title: 20Primary school sport
page.content: Our school has a lot of sports clubs. Although it is the beginning of the term we have already played in two matches.It is not really important who wins,like it seems to be when adults play in their teams,we play for the fun and enjoyment of being together.We do not get upset if our teams in football or netball do not win. I live in Hollowell and in the morning all the boys play football on a tarmac pitch whilst they wait for the school bus to arrive. Our school goes swimming in Northampton every Thursday.There are swimming badges called Aquanaut's to get.We also have a gymnastics club where we have different certificates for different grades and when you have passed all the certificates you can go onto sports acrobatics awards which need people to work in pairs.
